title.rendered: CoronaVirus COVID19 Air Travel procedures and restrictions

content.rendered:
Check what are the countries that requires any approval letter or form to submit, type of COVID-19 test to return back to their home country during COVID19 and PCR test requiring country

During the pandemic COVID 19 issue, all the traveler who wants to visit or return to the country needs to get permission letter or the approval letter from the specific country’s embassy or immigration centre. Check the below table for the procedure (how and where to get).

Procedures and the list of flight details to travel back to their destination during COVID 19

Australia

Check here for the procedure and documents required to travel back to Australia or transit to Australia during COVID-19 situation and how to get G2G Pass?

Austria

Check here for the procedure and the required forms, type of COVID-19 test to take, quarantine procedure to travel back to Austria or transit to Austria during COVID-19 situation and how to obtain pre‑travel clearance (PTC)?

Belgium

Passenger who wants to travel or transit to Belgium under COVID-19 situation must submit a passenger locator form. Check here for the procedure and documents required to travel back to Belgium or transit to Belgium during COVID -19 situation.

Canada

Passenger who wants to travel or transit to Canada under COVID-19 situation must submit a health declaration form through ArriveCAN and upload a negative COVID 19 certificate. Check here for the procedure and documents required to travel back to Canada or transit to Canada during COVID -19 situation and the type of COVID 19 test to take to enter Canada.

China

Passenger who wants to travel or transit to China under COVID-19 situation must submit a health declaration form and upload a negative COVID 19 (PCR test and IgM antibody test) certificate. Check here for the procedure and documents required to travel back to China or transit to China during COVID -19 situation.

Cyprus

Travelers who wants to travel or return to Cyprus during COVID-19 issue should apply for Cyprusflightpass. Check the details here

France

Travelers who wants to travel or return to France during COVID-19 issue should submit passenger locator form and other additional forms for EU nationals and other nationals. Check the details about the required forms, type of COVID-19 test to take, quarantine requirements here

Germany

Travelers who wants to travel or return to Germany during COVID-19 issue should apply for Digital Entry Application (DEA). Check the details here

Greece

Travelers who wants to travel or return to Greece during COVID-19 issue must complete Passenger Locator Form (PLF). Check the details here

Hong Kong

Travelers who wants to travel or return to Hong Kong during COVID-19 issue must complete Health declaration Form. Check the details here

India

Travelers who wants to travel or return to India during COVID-19 issue should request approval for the travel. Check the details here

Netherland

Passenger who wants to travel or transit to Netherland under COVID-19 situation must submit a health screening form and health declaration form. Check here for the procedure and documents required to travel back to Netherland or transit to Netherland during COVID -19 situation.

New Zealand

Travelers who wants to travel or return to New Zealand during COVID-19 issue should request approval from INZ. Check the details through INZ travel request

What are the flights operating to / from New Zealand during COVID 19?

The following flights resumes flight for the specific destination.

Malaysia Airlines operates flights to New Zealand from Malaysia

Senegal

Check here for the procedure and documents required to travel back to Senegal or transit to Senegal during COVID-19 situation.

Singapore

Travelers who wants to travel or return to Singapore during COVID-19 issue should submit an electronic health declaration via the SG Arrival Card e-Services

How to get ATP (Air travel pass) to travel Singapore from Australia, Australia (excluding NSW), Brunei Darussalam, China, New Zealand, Thailand, Vietnam

Passengers who comes in short-visit visa to Singapore from the above listed location are required to apply for Air Travel Pass (ATP) or ATP approval

Singapore MOM’s Entry Approval

All pass holders (work pass holders and dependants) must obtain MOM entry approvals from the relevant government agencies to enter Singapore.

What are the flights operating to Singapore during COVID 19?

Singapore airlines, Silkair resumes limited flights from Singapore to the specific destination. View the link for more details.

Etihad is flying to Singapore from Abu Dhabi: 19 & 26 May

Spain

  • All the passengers travelling to Spain from the other countries must sign the Sanitary Control Form (FCS) health control form through online or SpTH mobile app. Click here for more details.

Thailand

Travelers who wants to travel or return to Thailand during COVID-19 issue should get Certificate of Entry (COE) approval from MFA Thailand

United Arab Emirates (UAE)

Travelers who wants to travel or return to UAE during COVID-19 issue should get ICA approval from MOFA UAE

What are the flights operating to UAE during COVID 19?

The following flights resumes flight for the specific destination.

Emirates

Etihad

FlyDubai

View the link for more details

United Kingdom (UK)

Passenger who wants to travel or transit to UK under COVID-19 situation must submit a passenger locator form. Check here for the procedure and documents required to travel back to UK or transit to UK during COVID -19 situation.

Coronavirus (COVID-19) drive-through testing center in UK

Check the above link to access contact details of Coronavirus (COVID-19) drive-through testing center in UK.

USA

Passenger who wants to travel or transit to US under COVID-19 situation must Enroll in the Smart Traveler Enrollment Program STEP. Click here to know more details

COVID 19 – PCR Test center by country

Check here for the list of authorized COVID-19 – PCR test laboratory around the world.
